Goal Representation: ['1. Find a cup and fill it with water.', '2. Place the cup of water in the freezer.']

def has_cup_with_water(cup:item):
    # Function to check if a cup has water
    symbol has_water=has_water(cup)
    return has_water

behavior fill_cup_with_water(cup:item):
    body:
        achieve has_water(cup)
        # Ensure the cup is filled with water

behavior __goal__():

            is_cup(cup)
            # Bind a cup from available items
        if not has_cup_with_water(cup):
            fill_cup_with_water(cup)
            # Fill the cup with water if it doesnt have water
